r1 - 1, add r1 r1 1
0000 0100 0100 0100 0000 0000 0000 0001
1000 0000 0000 0000 0010 0010 0010 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000 0100 0100 0110 0000 - imm rs1 rd i opcode
0 4 4 4 0 0 0 1
8 0 0 0 2 2 2 0
10 00 44 40
20 22 00 80
60 44 00 00 - works, original convention was much better

r2 - 0x40001, addh r2 r1 4
0000 0100 1000 0110 0000 0000 0000 0100
0 4 8 6 0 0 0 4 

r3 - 0x4000, sub r3 r2 r1
0000 1000 1100 1000 0100 0000 0000 0000
0 8 c 8 4 0 0 0

r4 - cmp r4 r1 1
0010 1101 0000 0100 0000 0000 0000 0001
2 d 0 4 0 0 0 1

r5 - cmp r5 r1 r2
0010 1001 0100 0100 1000 0000 0000 0000
2 9 4 4 9 f f f

r6 - addu r5 r1 ffff
0000 0101 0100 0101 f f f f
0 5 4 5 f f f f

-----------------------------------------------------------
Testing load store instructions  + appended beq check


r1 - 1, add r1 r1 1
0000 0000 0000 0000 0100 0100 0110 0000 - imm rs1 rd i opcode
60 44 00 00 - works, original convention was much better

r1 - 1 r2 -3 r3 - 4 r4 - 0 r5 - 0
r1 - 1 r2 -3 r4 - 4 r4 - ffffffff r5 - ffffffff
test readme

add r2 r1 2
0000 0000 0000 0000 1000 0100 1010 0000
a0 84 00 00

0000 0000 0000 0000 1000 0100 1100 0000
c0 84 00 00

0000 0000 0000 0001 0000 1100 1110 0101

0000 0001 0000 0010 0000 0100 0110 1110 - imm rs1 rd i opcode
6e 04 02 01

6e 04 02 01
ld r1 r0 0x400 0100 0000 0000
6e 00 00 01

load status reg
and with 1
cmp r1 r1 0
beq -12
load data reg
store data 0x808

and r1 r1 1
